name: cmake-tools
description: Extended CMake support in Visual Studio Code

scripts.compile-production: yarn install && yarn run translations-generate && webpack --env BUILD_VSCODE_NLS=true --mode production
scripts.smokeTests: yarn run pretest && node ./out/test/smoke/badProject/runTest.js && node ./out/test/smoke/goodProject/runTest.js && node ./out/test/smoke/noCtest/runTest.js

view/item/context.when: view == cmake.projectStatus && cmake:enableFullFeatureSet && viewItem == 'configPreset - overrides present'
view == cmake.projectStatus && cmake:enableFullFeatureSet && viewItem == 'buildPreset - overrides present'
view == cmake.projectStatus && cmake:enableFullFeatureSet && viewItem == 'testPreset - overrides present'
view == cmake.projectStatus && cmake:enableFullFeatureSet && viewItem == 'packagePreset - overrides present'
